tool_description:
Use this API to convert your PDF file into text or words! 
Quickly and simply extract the plain text from a PDF.
name: PDF To Text Extract
title: PDF To Text Extract

api_list.name: post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-to-text-extract.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-to-text-extract.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-to-text-extract.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-to-text-extract.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
